      • callback

        public SimpleOAuthAppSettingsBuilder callback(String callback)
        Set the Callback for the application This implementation add a check to callback. If it's not 'oob' and doesn't start with 'http://' it'll try to get the path of the current application to dynamically create a return URL when connection on Oauth service is over. As some service build the Callback URL from domain name configured when the OAuth application is created (for security reasons), whe should make the distinction between relative URL that should be prefixed here (without a beginning "/") and relative url that will prefixed by remote service (with a beginning "/")
        Specified by:
        callback in interface OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
        Parameters:
        callback - a callback url or 'oob' if the application is not on the web
        Returns:
        this builder

      • scope

        public SimpleOAuthAppSettingsBuilder scope(String scope)
        Description copied from interface: OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
        Set the OAuth 2.0 scope for the application
        Specified by:
        scope in interface OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
        Parameters:
        scope - list (string separated by commas) of authorized action defined by Social Media for the application
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
